snippet: After saturation coverage of the campaigning in Iowa, news media outlets, at last, report on the results.
abstract: After saturation coverage of the campaigning in Iowa, news media outlets, at last, report on the results.
lead_paragraph: The 2012 Iowa caucuses on Tuesday night offer a first judgement on the Republican presidential candidates. But with its changing cast of frontrunners, Web-paced reports of scandal and intrigue, and saturation TV coverage of rural campaign stops, the Iowa campaigning has provided enough spectacle to exhaust entire teams of reporters.
